data.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative
data.description: An agent who specializes in protecting vulnerable VIP's with stealth and emergency medical aid.

starItems.name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Operative
starItems.description: An agent who specializes in protecting vulnerable VIP's with stealth and emergency medical aid.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer a positive effect from primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, to a random Nick Fury ally.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer a positive effect from primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, to a random Nick Fury ally.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer a positive effect from primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, to a random Nick Fury ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to transfer a positive effect from primary target to Nick Fury

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to transfer a positive effect from primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, to a random Nick Fury ally.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to transfer a positive effect from primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, to a random Nick Fury ally.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Always transfer a positive effect from primary target to Nick Fury

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Transfer a positive effect from primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, to a random Nick Fury ally.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage. On Crit, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Transfer a positive effect from primary target, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, to a random Nick Fury ally.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If there are no non-summoned allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to the most injured ally.
Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health + Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

If ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Coulson, also apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If there are no non-summoned allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to the most injured ally.
Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

If ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Coulson, also apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If there are no non-summoned allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to the most injured ally.
Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + Apply <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

If ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Coulson, also apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If there are no non-summoned allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to the most injured ally.
Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + Apply <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

If ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Coulson, also apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured non-summoned ally. If there are no non-summoned allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured ally.
Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + Apply <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

If ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Coulson, also apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured non-summoned ally. If there are no non-summoned allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured ally.
Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

If ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Coulson, also apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured non-summoned ally. If there are no non-summoned allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the most injured ally.
Heal that ally for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health + Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

If ally is Nick Fury or a <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if that ally is Coulson, also apply an additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random Nick Fury ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
Nick Fury and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> ally or self
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies can gain this <color=#fff568>Counter</color> as well

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random Nick Fury ally.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> ally or self. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies can gain this <color=#fff568>Counter</color> as well.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
Nick Fury and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Focus for self, Nick Fury, and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson gains +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Focus

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random Nick Fury ally.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> ally or self. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies can gain this <color=#fff568>Counter</color> as well.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus.
Nick Fury and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to Nick Fury
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies or self

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random Nick Fury ally.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies or self. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies can gain this <color=#fff568>Counter</color> as well.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus.
Nick Fury and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus for self, Nick Fury, and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson gains +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to a random Nick Fury ally.

On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random Nick Fury or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies or self. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies can gain this <color=#fff568>Counter</color> as well.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
Nick Fury and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, Agent Coulson allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.
